title: Michigan mom is arrested after allegedly sending harassing texts to her daughter
description: A Michigan mother was arrested after she sent months of harassing text messages to two teenagers, including her daughter, officials said Thursday.

title: FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried will be released on $250 million bail, judge rules
description: FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried will be released on $250 million bail, a federal judge in New York ruled Thursday.

title: 14 takeaways from the complaints against top FTX and Alameda executives
description: The collapse of crypto exchange FTX is becoming clearer.

title: An FTX co-founder and the former CEO at Alameda Research plead guilty to fraud
